price: 20. En de bazuin zal geblazen worden – dat zal de dag zijn waarvoor de waarschuwing (gegeven is).
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
